description:
Everyone likes a soft, breezy layer on a hot day. This one is made with fair trade certified sewing so you can feel good about buying it as well as wearing it.

  • Made of 100% Regenerative Organic Certified™ cotton for a soft-wearing, cool and comfortable feel
  • Screen-print inks are PVC and phthalate free
  • Made with Fair Trade Certified sewing
name: Patagonia Graphic Organic T-Shirt - Girls' - Children to Youths
